description:
The leading WebAssembly Runtime supporting WASI and Emscripten

Wasmer is a fast and secure WebAssembly runtime that enables super lightweight containers to run anywhere: from Desktop to the Cloud, Edge and IoT devices.
This release fixes minor bugs and adds spurious improvements.
Added
Changed
- #5305 make AppConfig.name optional in wasmer-config
- #5292 Pass readme content instead of readme file name
- #5300 Refactor path_create_directory and path_remove_directory toâ€¦
- #5277 Rephrase the description for --no-persist-id
- #5291 chore(wasix): make Capabilities hashable
- #5293 LoongArch: Switch to the medium code model
Fixed
- #5306 Fix build for 32bit targets (usize == u32)
- #5307 A few WASIX FS-related fixes
- #5285 Fix handling of the root path in WasiFS resulting in a bad inode structure
- #5294 Fix typo in readme file
